<<<<<<< HEAD
Here begynneth a litill boke necessarye [and] behouefull a[g]enst the pestilence Here begynneth a litil boke the whiche traytied many gode thinges for the pestilence. Joannes Jacobi, d. 1384. Régime de l'épidémie. Knutsson, Bengt, d. 1462, attributed name. Mikkelsen, Knud, attributed name.
[8] leaves
W. de Machlinia, [London : ca. 1485]
Derived from a Latin translation by Bengt Knutsson of "Régime de l'épidémie" by Joannes Jacobi. The Latin version has been attributed to Knutsson and to Knud Mikkelsen. This English version was originally published ca. 1485 as: Here begynneth a litil boke the whiche traytied many gode thinges for the pestilence. Caption title. Imprint from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8] leaves
W. de Machlinia, [London : ca. 1485]
Derived from a Latin translation by Bengt Knutsson of "Régime de l'épidémie" by Joannes Jacobi. The Latin version has been attributed to Knutsson and to Knud Mikkelsen. This English version was originally published ca. 1485 as: Here begynneth a litil boke the whiche traytied many gode thinges for the pestilence. Caption title. Imprint from STC.
